prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with large wings and vibrant purple scales.
Imagine a flying Pokemon that has a sleek body and sharp features.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a bat, featuring green accents and a fierce expression.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elegance with power, displaying a mix of black and purple.
Design a creature that soars through the mountains, boasting impressive wingspan and agility.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in forests, with a blend of dark and light colors.
Give me a unique Pokemon that uses sound waves as a form of attack.
